title: Life After Prison - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/10/19
itunes:title: Life After Prison - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/10/19
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and an open lines caller discuss his life after serving time in prison for a bank robbery, and how he uses the skills he learned as an inmate to read people can help him in his new life as a free man.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
